Hello

I'm a software engineer living in Singapore. I am currently the Lead Developer at TradeHero. I spend most of my days writing Objective-C and C# code. In my free time, I like to make stuff, take pictures, and blog about technology. Get in touch.

Apps

I started developing for iOS back in 2010 while I was still in university. Here are some apps I've worked on. I am no longer involved in the development of the first 5 as those belong to my previous employers.

  • NewtonApples
  • Schedaroo
  • LotteryTicket
  • BetterLetter
  • Bet Buttler
  • TradeHero

Open Source

I'm always hacking on random stuff. Here are some hightlights:
  • ModelLite — Alternative to CoreData on top of SQLite.
  • Life — Conway's Game of Life
  • MarkdownEditor — A simple markdown text editor.
  • TwittApp.net — Find your Twitter friends on App.net
  • Rdio2DayOne — Create Day One entries from your Rdio collection.
  • Portfolio-Unicorn — Learning Rails!
  • LargeNumberFormatter — Format large numbers with abreaviations.

Feel free to check out the full list of my open source projects on GitHub.
